mim.author: ejanjuv
mim.name: Evip_Ipsec
mim.description: Evip implementation of the ECIM Transport Ipsec MOM.

struct.name: Identity
struct.description:
Identification type.
It is an union identity, possible type as follows:
a) ID_FQDN: A fully-qualified domain name string. An example of a ID_FQDN is, "example.com". The string MUST not contain any terminators (e.g., NULL, CR, etc.).
b) ID_RFC822_ADDR: A fully-qualified RFC822 email address string, An example of a ID_RFC822_ADDR is, "jsmith@example.com". The string MUST not contain any terminators.
c) ID_IPV4_ADDR: A single four (4) octet IPv4 address.
d) ID_IPV6_ADDR: A single sixteen (16) octet IPv6 address.
e) DN_X509: Distinguished name in the X.509 tradition.

structMember.name: ipv4Address
structMember.description:
Specifies the identity as a single four (4) octet IPv4 address.
An example is, "10.10.10.10".

structMember.name: ipv6Address
structMember.description:
Specifies the identity as a single sixteen (16) octet IPv6 address.
An example is, "FF01::101, 2001:DB8:0:0:8:800:200C:417A ".

structMember.name: fqdnString
structMember.description:
Specifies the identity as a fully-qualified domain name string.
An example is, "example.com". The string MUST not contain any terminators (e.g., NULL, CR, etc.).

structMember.name: rfc822AddressString
structMember.description:
Specifies the identity as a fully-qualified RFC822 email address string.
An example is, "jsmith@example.com". The string MUST not contain any terminators (e.g., NULL, CR, etc.).

structMember.name: dnX509
structMember.description: Specifies the identity as a distinguished name in the X.509 tradition.

struct.name: IpsecProposal
struct.description: Ipsec Transform to be proposed during SA negotiation.

structMember.name: encryptionAlgorithm
structMember.description: Specifies the algorithm used for encryption.

structMember.name: integrityAlgorithm
structMember.description: Specifies the algorithm used for integrity check.

structMember.name: diffieHellmanGroup
structMember.description:
Specifies a Diffie-Hellman group.
If it is not specified, PFS is disabled.

struct.name: Ikev2Proposal
struct.description:
Holds an IKEv2 transform proposal used during IKEv2 SA negotiation.
Multiple IKEv2 Transforms can be proposed during an IKEv2 session initiation in an ordered list.

structMember.name: integrityAlgorithm
structMember.description: Specifies an algorithm for integrity check.

struct.name: TrafficSelector
struct.description: Traffic selector to be used for SA negotiation.

structMember.name: addressRange
structMember.description: Specifies the IPv4 or IPv6 address range.

structMember.name: timeLimit
structMember.description: Specifies the maximum lifetime when a SA can be used.

enumMember.name: RESPONDER
enumMember.description: ME will act as responder for bringing up IKEv2 session with its IKE peer.

enumMember.name: BOTH
enumMember.description: ME can act as initiator or responder.

enum.name: TransportProtocolName
enum.description: Enumeration of well known transport protocols.

class.name: Ikev2PolicyProfile
class.description:
Common information for multiple IKE sessions to be instantiated on a managed element.
One or more Ikev2Session instances might refer to this instance.

attribute.name: ikev2PolicyProfileId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: trustCategory
attribute.description:
Reference to a trusted certificates group.
Valid reference is TrustCategory in Certificate Management Branch. If credential and trustCategory are not specified, then pre-shared key based authentication is selected. The referring Ikev2Session instances have to have pre-shared keys installed.

attribute.name: identityLocal
attribute.description:
Local identity.
If the local identity is not configured, it is automatically configured in the system as follows: a) In case of certificate based authentication, the local identity is set to the same value as specified by the subject alt name in the certificate that the node use. b) In case of preshared key-based authentication, the local identity is set to the local IP address of the tunnel.

attribute.name: ikev2Proposal
attribute.description:
Ordered list of IKE proposals to be used for IKE SA negotiation.
At least one IKE proposal must be specified. The first one in the list has the highest priority.

attribute.name: ikeSaLifetime
attribute.description: Lifetime for IKE SA.

attribute.name: connectionType
attribute.description: Connection type of the IKEv2 session.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: dpdKeepAliveInterval
attribute.description: The keep alive interval with which INFORMATIONAL exchanges are sent to the peer.

attribute.name: credential
attribute.description:
Reference to the managed element own credential to be used in IKEv2 negotiation.
Valid reference is a NodeCredential in Certificate Management Branch.
If credential and trustCategory are not specified, then preshared key-based authentication is selected. The referring Ikev2Session instances must have preshared keys installed.

class.name: IpsecProposalProfile

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='create' test='( (count(@ipsecProposal/@diffieHellmanGroup) eq 0) or (every $var in ../IpsecTunnel/Phase2Policy/@ipsecProposalProfile/@ipsecProposalProfileId satisfies (not(@ipsecProposalProfileId eq $var))) )'>Only IKEv2 can set DH-group.</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='create' test='( (count(@ipsecProposal/@diffieHellmanGroup) eq 0) or (every $var in ../IpsecTunnel/Phase2Policy/@ipsecProposalProfile/@ipsecProposalProfileId satisfies (not(@ipsecProposalProfileId eq $var))) )'>Only IKEv2 can set DH-group.</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: ipsecProposalProfileId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: childSaLifetime
attribute.description: Lifetime for the negotiated ChildSAs.

attribute.name: ipsecProposal
attribute.description: An ordered list of Ipsec transforms to be proposed during IKEv2 negotiation.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: IpsecTunnel
class.description: Configuration and runtime information of an Ipsec tunnel between two end points.

attribute.name: ipsecTunnelId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: localAddressStr
attribute.description:
Tunnel local endpoint assigned IP address.
Rule: The local and remote address must have the same address family and belong to the same routing domain.

attribute.name: remoteAddressStr
attribute.description:
Tunnel remote end point external IP address.
Rule: The local and remote address must have the same address family and belong to the same routing domain.

class.name: IpsecPolicy
class.description: Holds configuration information for Ipsec policies.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='create' test='( (count(../Phase2Policy) eq 0) and (count(../Ikev1Session) eq 0) )'>Under one IpsecTunnel instance there can be only IKEv1 or only IKEv2.</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='create' test='( (count(../Phase2Policy) eq 0) and (count(../Ikev1Session) eq 0) )'>Under one IpsecTunnel instance there can be only IKEv1 or only IKEv2.</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: ipsecPolicyId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: ipsecProposalProfile
attribute.description: Reference to an Ipsec transform profile.

attribute.name: localTrafficSelector
attribute.description:
Ordered list of traffic selectors to be used for SA negotiation.
If localTrafficSelector is not specified, it means that all the local addresses and subnets within the current routing domain are included. The first in the list has the highest priority.

attribute.name: remoteTrafficSelector
attribute.description:
Ordered list of traffic selectors to be used for SA negotiation.
If remoteTrafficSelector is not specified, it means wildcard(i.e. any possible IP address, protocol etc). The first in the list has the highest priority.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: Ikev2Session
class.description:
Ikev2Session is used to specify that IKEv2 should be used to negotiate SAs for the tunnel.
It contains parameters specific to the IKEv2 protocol.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='create' test='( (count(../Phase2Policy) eq 0) and (count(../Ikev1Session) eq 0) )'>Under one IpsecTunnel instance there can be only IKEv1 or only IKEv2.</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='create' test='( (count(../Phase2Policy) eq 0) and (count(../Ikev1Session) eq 0) )'>Under one IpsecTunnel instance there can be only IKEv1 or only IKEv2.</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

action.name: installPreSharedKey
action.description:
Install a preshared key for the IKEv2 session.
The installation of the pre-shared key is completed if the action is completed without error. Any error returned by the action indicates that the installation is not performed. If both credential and trustCategory have valid references, then the preshared key is not used even if it is installed.

attribute.name: ikev2SessionId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: ikev2PolicyProfile
attribute.description: Reference to an IKE policy profile instance.

attribute.name: identityRemote
attribute.description:
Identity of the IKEv2 peer.
If identityRemote is not specified, the session will validate the remote IKE identify as follows: a) In case of certificate based authentication, the peers IKE ID must be consistent with either the subject alt name or the subject field in the peers certificate; b) In case of pre-shared key based authentication, the peer's IKE ID must be consistent with the configured IP address of the peer.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.
